<title level="1" right="Rules">[Emanation](/Rules.aspx?ID=2387)</title>

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 428 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
An emanation issues forth from each side of your space, extending out to a specified number of feet in all directions. For instance, the [_bless_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1451) spell’s emanation radiates 15 or more feet outward from the caster. Because the sides of a creature’s space are the starting point for the emanation, an emanation from a Large or larger creature affects a greater overall area than that of a Medium or smaller creature. Unless the text states otherwise, the creature creating an emanation effect chooses whether the creature at its center is affected.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
